market: AI is still a structural growth cycle, but 2026 leadership depends on production conversion and cash-flow quality rather than headline model launches.
tech: Value is shifting toward inference efficiency, integrated enterprise workflows, and governance-ready deployment; pure benchmark gains monetize less reliably on their own.
risk: Primary risk is capex outrunning monetization, amplified by export-control shifts, grid/power constraints, and faster-than-expected pricing compression.
